# Cookie

## Jar

~~~py
def index(request):
    res = render(request, 'sigange/index.html')
    res.set_cookie('hello', 'world')
    return res
~~~

~~~bash 
curl -i -c cookie.txt http://localhost:9000/signage/
~~~

~~~bash
$ cat cookie.txt

# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# https://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

localhost       FALSE   /       FALSE   0       hello   world
~~~

## ドメイン

~~~py
def home(request):
    # rp と op は  同じポートにすること
    res = redirect('http://rp.lafoglia.jp:9900/signage/')
    res.set_cookie('domain-token', 'Is Not Evil', domain='lafoglia.jp', samesite="Lax")
    return res
~~~

~~~bash
curl -c jar.txt  http://op.lafoglia.jp:9900/
~~~

~~~bash
$ cat jar.txt

# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# https://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

.lafoglia.jp    TRUE    /       FALSE   0       domain-token  "Is Not Evil"
~~~~
